titles.title: Congressional Revolving Door Ban Act
A bill to prohibit Members of Congress from lobbying after leaving Congress.

bill.summary:
Congressional Revolving Door Ban Act
This bill prohibits former Members of Congress from engaging in specified lobbying activities for compensation.
